body: The Nebula servers are fine, I am able to hop from one to the other, but I keep on getting an error message when I try connecting to the hub. Help?
body_tagged: The Nebula servers are fine, I am able to hop from one to the other, but I keep on getting an error message when I try connecting to the hub. Help?
title: Avicus Lobbies Down?

replies.body: They are down. I cant join.
replies.body_tagged: They are down. I cant join.

replies.body: Atleast you can still do the direct connect from each match, I can't even join the server. For now you can just do /server <server name>
replies.body_tagged: Atleast you can still do the direct connect from each match, I can't even join the server. For now you can just do /server <server name>

replies.body: I was kicked for "Internal Exception" so I am no longer able to hop from server to server. There also weren't enough players to start the match.
replies.body_tagged: I was kicked for "Internal Exception" so I am no longer able to hop from server to server. There also weren't enough players to start the match.

replies.body: I think so. I can't join
replies.body_tagged: I think so. I can't join

replies.body: Bridges here I come - for a while, lol
replies.body_tagged: Bridges here I come - for a while, lol

replies.body:
The lobbies are down at the moment for some reason however you can still connect to a direct game, for example Nexus02.avic.us

Sorry for the inconvenience
